name: Dataset Definition and Preparation Overview
content:
Dataset Overview:-


Sales Data:


DISTRIBUTOR_ID: Identifier for the distributor.

CUSTOMER_ID: Identifier for the customer.

INV_DT: Invoice date.

INV_NO: Invoice number.

INV_NO_KEY: Invoice key.

SKUID: Product identifier.

QTY: Quantity of the product.

GROSS: Gross amount.

UNITPRICE: Unit price of the product.


Distributor Data:


DISTRIBUTOR_ID: Identifier for the distributor.

DIST_NAME: Name of the distributor.

COUNTRY_ID: Country where the distributor is located.


Customer Data:


DISTRIBUTOR_ID: Identifier for the distributor.

CUSTOMER_ID: Identifier for the customer.

CUST_NAME: Name of the customer.

CUST_STARTDT: Customer start date.

COUNTRY_ID: Country where the customer is located.


Product Data:


SECTOR: Sector of the product.

CATEGORY: Category of the product.

SUBCATEGORY: Subcategory of the product.

SKUID: Product identifier.


Data Preparation and Feature engineering:-


Data Preparation:


Merge the sales data with customer data using the CUSTOMER_ID and DISTRIBUTOR_ID fields.

Join the resulting dataset with the distributor data using the DISTRIBUTOR_ID field.

Include relevant product information using the SKUID field.


Feature engineering:


Create relevant features for segmentation. These could include customer-related features, sales-related features, and product-related features.
